author: Jay Reeves / AP
title: Social Distancing During Twister Season? Coronavirus Pandemic Leaves Tornado Alley Residents With Tough Decision
description: Tornado Alley residents face whether they should take on a twister outside a community shelter or possibly contract COVID-19 inside one?
content: (TUSCALOOSA, Ala.) — As each day brings the United States closer to peak severe weather season, Tornado Alley residents are facing a difficult question: Is it better to take on a twister outside a community shelter or to face the possibility of contracting th… [+4802 chars]
